New Records: Klay Thompson set a franchise record for most 3s on debut for the Mavericks with six shots from deep.
Key Match Events: Klay Thompson scored 22 points, including six 3-pointers, in his debut for the Mavericks.
Luka Doncic scored a game-high 28 points.
The Mavericks won the game 120-109 against the Spurs.
Thompson's performance improved in the second half, contributing to the Mavericks' victory.
Post-Match Reflections: Klay Thompson expressed happiness and relief after his strong debut performance.
Thompson mentioned feeling nerves and anxiousness initially but felt great after making his first shot.
